refnamediv.refpurpose: Add divider comment to roff source before/after subheadings?

refsection.para: If the value of the man.subheading.divider.enabled parameter is non-zero, the contents of the man.subheading.divider parameter are used to add a "divider" before and after subheadings in the roff output. The divider is not visisble in the rendered man page; it is added as a comment, in the source, simply for the purpose of increasing reability of the source.
If man.subheading.divider.enabled is zero (the default), the subheading divider is suppressed.
